de.lwerner.flink.percentiles

Class SelectionProblem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.AbstractAlgorithm
      • de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.AbstractSelectionProblem
        • de.lwerner.flink.percentiles.SelectionProblem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Solvable

    public class SelectionProblem
extends AbstractSelectionProblem
    An algorithm for the selection problem. The ladder is the problem to find the kth smallest element in an unordered set of elements. Sequentially, this is as easy as bringing the elements in order and getting the kth element, in a distributed or parallel environment, this has to be done differently, when focus lies on performance.
    Author:
    Lukas Werner
